text: Andrea Tiberi (born 15 November 1985) is an Italian mountain bike racer. He rode at the cross-country event at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Italian mountain bikers Category:Cyclists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 2015 European Games Category:European Games competitors for Italy Category:Olympic cyclists of Italy
title: Andrea Tiberi
